title: Maya's Sacrifice
marks: Signature, Title, and Date LLC, in pencil: [Maya\'s Sacrifice]; LRC, in pencil
description: white-robed female figure in profile laying horizontally, red circle with black outline at chest; red line extending from circle at chest down top of robe to ankles; black and blue necklace, black hair; transparent blue cloth behind head; black background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
